assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Teraoka Seisakusho Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of various adhesive tapes worldwide. The company offers flame retardant, conductive/shielding, optic, shade, Kapton film adhesive, thermal conduction, silicone rubber adhesive, anti-electric charge adhesive, removable film adhesive, epoxy prepreg, and other adhesive tapes for electrical insulation and electronic equipment, as well as tapes for masking electrical equipment. It also provides film base transparent, film base black and white, film base other colors, silicone-based, thermal conduction, optics baseless, metal foil base, and nomex base double-coated adhesive tapes for electrical insulation and electronic equipment; and low VOC product solvent free, low VOC product toluene and xylene free, non-woven fabric base, form base, baseless general purpose type, and cloth and tissue base double-coated adhesive tapes for industrial applications. In addition, the company offers masking polyethylene cloth adhesive, masking cloth, line, vinyl adhesive, masking, polyethylene protection, aluminum foil adhesive, waterproof adhesive, waterproof double-coated adhesive, corrosion protection, harness fixing, safety sign, splicing, and other tapes for industrial applications; and cloth, polyethylene cloth, polypropylene film, Kraft paper, and other adhesive tapes for packing and packaging applications. Teraoka Seisakusho Co., Ltd. was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
